refnamediv.refpurpose: Patch a string with an unified diff

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: xdiff_string_patch patches string str with unified patch in string patch.
flags can be either XDIFF_PATCH_NORMAL (default mode, normal patch) or XDIFF_PATCH_REVERSE (reversed patch).
If error is passed then rejected parts are stored inside this variable.

example.title: xdiff_string_patch example
example.para: The following code applies changes to some article.
example.programlisting:
<?php
$old_article = file_get_contents('./old_article.txt');
$diff = $_SERVER['patch']; /* Let's say that someone pasted a patch to html form */

$errors = '';

$new_article = xdiff_string_patch($old_article, $diff, XDIFF_PATCH_NORMAL, $errors);
if (is_string($new_article)) {
    echo "New article:\n";
    echo $new_article;
}

if (strlen($errors)) {
    echo "Rejects: \n";
    echo $errors;
}

?>
